EmailTemplate.subject: How PWC South Africa Improved Utilization by nearly 60%
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Let me know if this sounds familiar. PwC South Africa <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/case-studies/pwc-south-africa-success-story]]>was facing growth in users and its infrastructure, unable to guarantee the performance of mission-critical applications, inaccurate capacity management, and inefficient use of human resources. Here’s what changed after deploying Turbonomic:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/case-studies/pwc-south-africa-success-story]]>
More than 1,900 organizations leverage Turbonomic to optimize for performance, cost, and compliance in real-time. See who’s on board by industry <[[https://turbonomic.com/customers/customers-by-industry/]]>.
Regards,
Team Turbonomic
<[[turbonomic.com]]>
